mapper.select: SELECT t1.id,t1.alarm_id,t1.type,t1.title,t1.content,t1.`status`,t1.create_by, t1.create_date,t1.update_by,t1.update_date,t1.remarks,t1.del_flag, t2.content alarm_content ,t2.create_date alarm_create_date,t2.is_important FROM bph_alarm_notify t1 LEFT JOIN bph_alarm_info t2 on t1.alarm_id = t2.id WHERE 1 = 1 and t1.receive_user_id = #{handlePoliceId} ORDER BY t1.create_date desc
SELECT count(*) FROM bph_alarm_notify t1 where t1.receive_user_id = #{userId}
SELECT count(*) FROM bph_alarm_notify as t1 where t1.status = '0' AND t1.receive_user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE bph_alarm_notify t1 SET t1.`status` = '1' WHERE t1.id = #{id} and t1.receive_user_id = #{userId}
